identity.name: WanderLust AI
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix travel journal aesthetics with SaaS precision.
Emotion First: Every screen should feel like the start of a vacation.
Content is King: Photos and Maps take precedence over UI chrome.
Zoom In: Use large, immersive imagery for destinations.
Negative Space: Use 'Sand' colored backgrounds to let content breathe.

primary.description: Sunset Coral - Use for primary CTAs and key highlights.

secondary.description: Tropical Teal - Use for success states, map markers, and secondary accents.

background.description: Warm Sand - Main background color to avoid harsh white.

grids.timeline: flex flex-col gap-8 border-l-2 border-dashed border-primary/20 pl-8 ml-4

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/10 hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-border/40 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden

inputs.base: h-14 bg-white border-2 border-transparent focus:border-primary/20 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 rounded-xl text-lg px-6 transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or main landing visual

adventure.usage: Adventure category or trip type selection

city_life.usage: Foodie/City category or itinerary activity example

steps: 1. Setup Fonts: Add Google Fonts imports to index.css
2. Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'WanderLust' color palette and border radius.
3. Global Styles: Set body background to #FDFBF7 in index.css.
4. Component Overrides: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) to match the rounded, vibrant aesthetic.
5. Layout Construction: Build the Hero section using the 'hero_bg' image and a glassmorphism search card.
6. Form Design: Create a multi-step wizard for trip planning using framer-motion for smooth transitions between steps.
7. Itinerary View: Implement the timeline layout for the day-by-day plan.
universal_rules: Do NOT use default Shadcn styling. Override with the specified rounded-full and vibrant colors.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Mobile responsiveness is critical - test all grids on small screens.
